description: The temporary measure is to cut the burden on the island's hospital during the coronavirus outbreak.
title: Coronavirus: Temporary 40mph national speed limit introduced on Isle of Man
title_page: Coronavirus: Temporary 40mph national speed limit introduced on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: The island currently has no national speed limit and several roads are derestricted, although some additional restrictions are put in place during the TT races.
